meanings.definition: Capable of being overcome or conquered.
meanings.sent1: The small hill was surmountable for the determined hiker.
meanings.sent2: With hard work and dedication, any obstacle can be surmountable.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought the bird feeder was surmountable, but it outsmarted him.
meanings.sent4: She viewed the challenging project as a surmountable mountain waiting to be conquered.
meanings.sent5: The knight saw the dragon as a surmountable foe, ready to be defeated.

meanings.definition: Able to be surmounted or surpassed.
meanings.sent1: The surmountable task of finishing the puzzle was finally achieved.
meanings.sent2: Despite the odds, the team believed the competition was surmountable.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the mouse's hiding spot to be quite surmountable.
meanings.sent4: The surmountable goal of reaching the summit kept the climbers motivated.
meanings.sent5: The surmountable challenge of learning a new language excited her.
